DOC.brief_summary: Subjects dose twice daily 9AM 9PM 12 week . The primary efficacy variable mean change Intraocular Pressure ( IOP ) baseline 12 week . Secondary efficacy variable : % IOP ≤ 18 millimeter mercury ( mmHg ) . Exploratory endpoint : Ocular discomfort scale first dose .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy AZARGA® Versus COSOPT® Patients With Open-Angled Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
